articles.description: Founder of $62bn firm hits out at US proposals to treat big players in his industry like broker-dealer arms of banks
articles.content: Ken Griffin, the founder and chief executive of $62bn US hedge fund Citadel, has warned regulators that they should focus their attention on banks rather than his industry if they want to reduce risk… [+5134 chars]
